sub_title: Senior Solution Development Consultant at Workiva
summary:
Currently working as a Senior Solution Development Consultant at Workiva, where I help clients develop ESG reporting solutions. 

Before Workiva, I worked in Payments as an Implementation manager for Payvision (part of ING group) and Dimebox (acquired by Verifone).

I also worked as a Presales Solution Architect at SaaSplaza while in Amsterdam. Before moving to the Netherlands, I worked as a Technology Consulting Senior Analyst at Accenture where I did a range of roles from Technical Architecture, business analysis, strategy, operations, and development.

While studying Aerospace Engineering in university, I worked in performance engineering for United Technologies Aerospace Systems, as well as, designed and built ocean sailing catamarans in Cape Town, South Africa.

projects.title: Rotary Unmanned Aerial System (RUAS) Project
projects.description:
The project involves the design, manufacturing and testing of a medium sized rotary wing unmanned aerial system. The RUAS would serve as a trade-off between huge commercial markets: R/C helicopters and UAVs.

As the student lead for Aerodynamics team, the experience includes:
- Scheduling meetings and training tutorials to effectively complete deliverables 
- Developing and running a Fortran code to simulate rotorcraft blade dynamics, aeroacoustics and aeroelastics

projects.title: CS50x
projects.description:
CS50x is an online computer science course offered by Harvardx.  The course deliverables included seven problem sets, two quizes and a final project using C, HTML and PHP.

The experience from this course include:
- Developing software with C that can manipulate pictures and recover deleted file
- Creating a web-based program to allow a user to buy, trade and research stocks

contributors.headline: Senior Solution Development Consultant at Workiva

projects.title: BMW Urban Driving Experience Challenge - Phase II: Refinement
projects.description:
The BMW Urban Driving Experience Challenge - Phase II: Refinement project required participants to transform the future automobile into a value-adding, socially responsible machine to contribute to the well-being of communities and cities around the world.

The experiences for this challenge include:
- Researching systems for sustainable vehicles
- Developing alternative power source features
- Performing a technical analysis to demonstrate the feature's capability
- Using "Design Thinking" methodologies to iterate design cycles daily during the final stages
- Forecasting economical and environmental impacts of sustainable vehicles

contributors.headline: Senior Solution Development Consultant at Workiva

projects.title: BMW Urban Driving Experience Challenge
projects.description:
The BMW Urban Driving Experience Challenge required participants to redefine urban mobility by designing vehicle features or functions to solve environmental and lifestyle issues.

The experiences for this challenge include:
- Researching possible features for future vehicles in 2025
- Developing driverless vehicle features
- Performing a high level technical analysis to support the feature's advantage
- Communicating with BMW representatives to refine feature
- Submitting a slideshow summary to a panel of judges
- Collaborating with other participants through the open-source format

contributors.headline: Senior Solution Development Consultant at Workiva

profile_positions.description:
At Payvision I help merchants and partners with the technical aspects of their payments integration.

Presales:
- Work with prospects to understand their challenges with payments and advise on the technical solution
- Built the Payvision demo apps to be able to provide a visualization of the technical flows and help product and dev teams to have a better high-level understanding

Implementation:
- Provide a tailored technical integration package with key diagrams, sample requests, FAQ and postman collections
- Share insights from related production processing to help merchants optimize their solution in the integration phase
- Act as a project manager to ensure all technical aspects are delivered on time
- Advise on test and go-live plans

Support:
- Investigate issues in production for merchants and advise how to prevent in the future
- Proactively check key cases in production and notify merchants if needed
- Advise on opportunities to enhance a merchant's technical integration
- Provide feedback to our Product teams to optimize our offering for merchants
profile_positions.title: Technical Integration Manager

profile_positions.description:
Dimebox was acquired by Verifone in Dec 2018. On top of my duties performed at Dimebox, I also worked on the following:
- Training the Verifone Presales, Integration, Support, Billing and Onboarding teams on the new Global Omnichannel solution
- Leading integrations for new merchants 
- Integrating the Magento Plugin for Ecommerce Sales demos
- Consulting merchants on their 3DS2 implementations
- Demoing the Global Omnichannel solution to new merchants
- Preparing sales materials for retail tradeshows
- Building automation scripts in Python to assess Acquirer performance and automate testing after deployments
- Onboarding new hires through a series of presentations, activities and a side project
profile_positions.title: Implementation Manager

profile_positions.description:
At Dimebox, I help customers move to our modern payment platform in the following areas:

Presales:
- Work with prospective customers to answer functional and technical questions
- Demo full stack payments solution including acquiring, gateway, analytics and fraud solutions
- Lead technical deliverables for large Proof-of-Concepts with prospective customer integrations with our platform

Implementation:
- Onboard customers to our platform by training them on our solution
- Coordinate with partners to setup credentials for cards, APMs, Fraud and 3DS configurations
- Support customer’s technical questions during live testing 

Technical Account Management:
- Provide 1st line technical support for live customers
- Develop transaction-level monitoring to help customers avoid issues and outages
- Advise customers on optimizing their payments by pulling data with Python scripts into Google Data Studio reports
- Lead weekly calls with customers to discuss growth opportunities and issues

Other:
- Support finance department by creating analytic reports to summarize AWS costs
- Created tool to compare cloud prices from AWS and Google Cloud Platform
profile_positions.title: Implementation Manager

profile_positions.description:
My responsibilities as a Presales Solution Architecture included:
- Gathering requirements from Partners and Customers
- Scoping and designing a solution based on our Dynamics and Azure SaaS solutions
- Supporting sales team through the sales cycle
- Research into commercial options for new services
- Assessing customers cloud to reduce cost, increase performance and functionality
- Consulting customers and partners with design challenges
profile_positions.title: Presales Solution Architect

profile_positions.description:
Technology Architecture Strategy Assessment for a Government Department’s Application Architecture
o	Worked with client executives to evaluate key issues in the Application Architecture
o	Interviewed client Senior Management in key areas to better understand the issues with their Portal, CRM, API, BI and IAM
o	Collaborated with Accenture community to base the architecture recommendations on a wide range of experiences and design standards 

Technology Consulting role for migrating a Government Department’s databases and applications to the cloud
o	Managed Operational changes for migrating applications to cloud environment
o	Gathered business requirements, software product testing and acceptance testing support
o	Led daily scrum call with client to implement operational changes and defect management
o	Created test approach and plans for operational product testing

Management Consulting role for merging services for transit farecard client with large transit provider in Toronto
o	Developed process maps for all of the services offered by the client
o	Created a Service Catalogue
o	Led review sessions with c-suite executives from the client to get feedback and signoff

Strategy role for Accenture Development Partnership’s Go to Market Strategy for the Agriculture and Nutrition division in Africa
o	Led team of 5 to create a landmark assessment of all of the organizations and programs within Agriculture and Nutrition in Africa
o	Trained new joiners on how to research and landmark assessment documentation

Management Consulting role for supporting Accenture Development Partnerships ICT4D market research
o	Created a thought leadership document on upcoming trends within the Information, Communication and Technology for Development for Accenture’s Sales teams
profile_positions.title: Technology Consulting Senior Analyst

profile_positions.description:
•	Created a 3D CAD model for a 40 ft. long ocean sailing catamaran using RHINO
•	Supported the manufacturing team in the build and assembly
profile_positions.title: Yacht Design Intern

profile_positions.description:
As a engineering design student, I have gained experience in developing the design for a racing sailboat concept with a small heeling moment. I contributed by:

- Designing a high lift airfoil and wing­‐sail
- Calculating buckling loads, lift, drag, aerodynamic hinge moment and sail
force for wing-­sail
profile_positions.title: Engineering Design Student

profile_positions.description:
As an aerospace engineering Co-op student I have gained engineering experience in R&D, project development, testing and customer support services for a variety of commercial aircraft and military rotorcraft programs. In addition I provided value by:

•	Provided customers with performance reports to certify aircraft in new markets
•	Developed MATLAB and IMC FAMOS software tools to determine load, pressure, damping and vibration results from large sets of test data
•	Investigated the causes for vibration in aircraft products
•	Analyzed test data using Fast Fourier Transforms (FFTs), vibration energy and damping calculation methods for a electric landing gear R&D project
•	Analyzed and summarizing landing simulations for large commercial aircraft
profile_positions.title: Aerospace Engineering Co-op Student

profile_positions.description:
At Weber Arctic I supported the design for the Weber Mukluk ski binding aimed at Arctic and Antarctic expedition, scientific and military markets.

•	Consulted on the material selection to improve the reliability of the ski binding
•	Executed design cycle iterations to introduce cost savings and to simplify the manufacturing demands in China
•	Finalized the design after receiving feedback from 53 people who skied to the North Pole with the binding
profile_positions.title: Ski Binding Product Designer

volunteer_experiences.description:
The Accenture Ottawa office held 5 Hour of Code events in the Ottawa area in 2016. I supported by:
- Coordinating logistics with school and youth organizations
- Creating a budget for each event
- Representing the Ottawa office on the Canada-wide status call
- Creating the internal marking materials for the Accenture Offices across Canada
- Creating an overview presentation of Accenture to present to High School students

At the Youth Services Bureau, I hosted 2 workshops (of ~100 students in each) on workplace communication skills for underprivileged youth. The experience included:
 - preparing and delivering materials and games to teach youth about the importance of voice, listening, non-verbal communication skills in the workplace

My volunteer work at ACCESS IT Connections includes:
- interviewing experienced IT professionals who have recently moved to Canada
- providing feedback and insight on each participant's interview

Amazekani is a logistics company, based in Cape Town, South Africa, that was looking for startup loan. My volunteer experience included:
- Researching the logistics industry in South Africa
- Helping the co-founders develop a business plan and financial projection
Mentored a workshop for 8 year old kids leaning to code with HTML and CSS
